headline.main: ASK FOR AIRCRAFT LABOR; Industry Urges Six-Month Deferment of Key Workers

lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON, Oct. 1 (AP) -- The National Aircraft War Production Council called tonight for six months' draft deferment for key aircraft workers and a return to warplane manufacture of needed former workers now in the armed services.
abstract: Natl Aircraft Production Council urges 6-months' draft deferment of key aircraft workers and return of those drafted; urges penalties for violations of WMC hiring controls; opposes natl service act
snippet: WASHINGTON, Oct. 1 (AP) -- The National Aircraft War Production Council called tonight for six months' draft deferment for key aircraft workers and a return to warplane manufacture of needed former workers now in the armed services....
